item.title: Man Utd's complicated relationship with Class of 92
item.description: Manchester United and the class of 92 have a complicated relationship. But is it a problem?

item.title: I do not want to reconcile with my family, says Brooklyn Peltz Beckham
item.description: Speculation has been circulating in the press for months over a rift in the Beckham family.

item.title: Trump: “I No Longer Feel An Obligation To Think Purely Of Peace”
item.description: European leaders respond to President Trump’s tariff threat.

item.title: What we know about Spain's worst rail disaster in over a decade
item.description: What caused the train to derail remains unclear but officials say an investigation has been launched.

item.title: Trump ties issue to Nobel Prize in message to Norway's leader
item.description: The US president insists Norway controls who gets the coveted prize, which the Norwegian government says it has nothing to do with it.
